mapper.insert: insert into staff_org_rel (STAFF_ORG_REL_ID, REL_TYPE, ROLE_ID, STAFF_ID, ORG_ID, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF) values (#{staffOrgRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update staff_org_rel set REL_TYPE = #{relType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT} where STAFF_ORG_REL_ID = #{staffOrgRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select STAFF_ORG_REL_ID, REL_TYPE, ROLE_ID, STAFF_ID, ORG_ID, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from staff_org_rel where STAFF_ORG_REL_ID = #{staffOrgRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select STAFF_ORG_REL_ID, REL_TYPE, ROLE_ID, STAFF_ID, ORG_ID, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from staff_org_rel
SELECT STAFF_ID,STAFF_CODE,ORG_ID,STAFF_NAME,SALESSTAFF_CODE FROM staff WHERE STATUS_CD =1000 AND STAFF_ID = #{staffId ,jdbcType=BIGINT}
